game.name: Hostile Waters: Antaeus Rising
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 트레이딩 카드, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: In 2032 an Earth that knows only peace is forced to relearn the art of war. Twenty years have passed since the population of Earth did a fine job of destroying nearly everything in one final struggle for power by the politicians and military leaders.
game.shortDescriptionEn: In 2032 an Earth that knows only peace is forced to relearn the art of war. Twenty years have passed since the population of Earth did a fine job of destroying nearly everything in one final struggle for power by the politicians and military leaders.
